name: Chicago Pizza
desc: The pan in which it is baked gives the pizza its characteristically high edge which provides ample space for large amounts of chunky tomato sauce.

name: Neapolitan Pizza
desc: This style of pizza is prepared with simple and fresh ingredients: a basic dough, raw tomatoes, fresh basil, and olive oil. A fantastic original pizza.

name: New York Pizza
desc: New York-style pizza has slices that are large and wide with a thin crust that is foldable yet crispy. It is traditionally topped with tomato sauce and veggies.

name: Sicilian Pizza
desc: Sicilian pizza is classic. A great tasteful pizza all around.
